v.v: Then Yahweh said to me, “Go and love a woman, even though she is loved by another man, and she is also unfaithful to her husband. You will be like me, because I love the people of Israel, even though they worship other gods and eat raisin cakes in their honor.”
Even though she was a slave, owned by another person, I bought her for 170 grams of silver, and 330 liters of barley grain.

Then I said to her, “You will live with me from now on. You will no longer be a prostitute who sleeps with various men. You will not belong to any other man, only to me, and I will be faithful to you and live with you for the rest of my life.”

When I do these things, this is to show that the people of Israel will live for a long time and not have any king ruling over them. They will have no prince, no sacrifices or pillars set up for worship, ephods or idols in their houses.

After some time, the people of Israel will return to Yahweh; they will hope that he will receive them back. They will hope to have a descendant of David for their king again. In the later time, they will come to Yahweh to honor him and tremble before him because of his goodness to them.
Listen to the message Yahweh has for you.
You curse and lie, you kill and steal, and you commit adultery.
Because of what the people are doing, the land is now a wilderness.
But you must not accuse anyone else for this trouble.
You priests sin during the day
My people are perishing because you priests have refused to understand me.
The more numerous you priests become,
When other people sin, they bring sacrifices to me, some of which you eat.
I will punish you priests just as I punish the people.
You all will eat, but you will never get enough. You will always be hungry.
You love to do forbidden sexual acts,
My own people pray to an idol made from a piece of wood.
They worship other gods in the places on the tops of the mountains where they have set up idols. They burn offerings to the idols up on those hills—
But I will not punish the women for turning to prostitution,
Israel, you have left me and gone to idols.
Israel is as stubborn as a young cow.
Ephraim has gone to join idols.
When they have finished drinking all their alcoholic drinks
Someone will attack them; he will be like a whirlwind that lifts them up and carries them away to another place.
“Listen, you priests!
Those who rebelled against me have now killed so many that they are standing deep in their blood. I tell you that I will punish them all.
You, the people in Ephraim, the center of Israel—I know you.
Ephraim and Israel are not able to ask me to forgive them, because of what they have done.
Israel is proud; because of this others know how guilty she is.
They are hoping to persuade Yahweh to have mercy on them.
They did not keep their promises to Yahweh.
Yahweh says, “Blow the ram horns at the city of Gibeah!
I will punish the people of Ephraim and turn their city into a pile of rubble.
The leaders of Judah are as bad as people who steal farmland by moving boundary markers;
Ephraim will suffer greatly; the people will perish when I punish them,
I will destroy Ephraim as a moth destroys wool;
When the people of Ephraim realized how weak they were,
I will become like a lion to the people of Ephraim in Israel;
Then I will go back to where I came from;
The people say, “Come, let us return to Yahweh.
After the second day he will restore our strength;
Try to know Yahweh;
But Yahweh says, “What can I do with you, you people of Ephraim?
I sent my prophets to you,
Yahweh says, “I want you to be faithful to me forever.
But like Adam, the first man,
Gilead is a city of people who do wicked things;
As robbers make their plans to hide and then rob someone walking past them,
Among the people of Israel, I have seen a horrible thing—
And for you also, you people of Judah,
As often as I try to heal Israel,
But they do not take a moment to think that I, Yahweh, see everything they do.
The wicked things they do bring delight to their king,
They are all sexually immoral;
At the king’s festivals, his officials do outrageous things because they are drunk with wine,
But these same officials then set about making plans to murder the king.
All those officials become so angry at the king,
“Israel joins with other people groups,
People who come from far away have taken away Israel’s strength.
Israel is so proud that everyone else sees it.
Israel is like a foolish bird, a dove that anyone can easily deceive.
But when they are on their way there,
How terrible it will be
They do not cry out to me; they do not call to me from their hearts;
Even though I trained them and helped them become strong,
They go this way and that, but never to me, God Most High.
Yahweh says, “Get a trumpet and blow it.
My people Israel cry out to me and say,
But the people of Israel have thrown away what is good,
Israel has appointed kings for themselves,
The prophet says, “Yes, Yahweh has rejected your idol, you people of Samaria—an idol made in the form of a calf!”
The shame of it is that this idol came from Israel! A craftsman made it.
This is because these people do useless things, so something terrible will destroy them.
Other nations have destroyed Israel’s power.
They asked the king of Assyria for help;
Although they do this,
The people of Ephraim have built many altars on which to offer sacrifices for their sins;
Even if I wrote out for the people of Israel my laws ten thousand times,
Let us think about the sacrifices that they give to me.
And why has this happened?
Hosea says this: Do not be happy, O Israel; do not celebrate like other people groups!
Now you will not have enough grain or wine to feed your people.
The people of Israel will not continue to live in the land that Yahweh has chosen as his own.
No longer will they pour out wine to offer it to Yahweh;
There, in a country far from your home, you will not be able to celebrate the festivals that Yahweh commanded you to celebrate.
Look! If you escape and the Assyrians do not kill you,
It is now the time for God to punish you;
True prophets are people whom God has assigned to guard the people of Israel.
The people have polluted themselves by sinning
Yahweh says, “When I found Israel, it was like someone finding grapes growing in the wilderness.
The honor of Ephraim is like a bird that is flying away.
Even if they raise children not their own,
I have seen the people of Israel;
Hosea says, Yahweh, give them—
Yahweh says, “Because of all the wicked things my people did at Gilgal,
Ephraim is like a vine that has dried up
Hosea says, My God rejected the people of Israel
Israel is like a vine
They are deceitful and cannot be trusted;
They say, “We have no king now because we did not honor or respect Yahweh.
The people of Israel make lying promises and false covenants;
Those people of Samaria tremble with fear because of what happened to the calf idols at Beth Aven.
Their idols will be carried to Assyria
The king of Samaria will die.
The hilltop places known for their wickedness—altars where the people worshiped idols—will all be destroyed.
People of Israel, since the days of Gibeah you have been sinning;
Yahweh says, “When I decide to act, I will punish them.
Ephraim is like a trained calf
Plow, now, and do what is right,
You have sinned wickedly, and now you will have to bear the consequences.
The sound of war will be among your people;
That is what will be done to you, you people of the city of Bethel,
Yahweh says, “When the nation of Israel was like a young man, I loved him.
But the more I called out to them,
But it was I who taught them to do everything good, as a father teaches his son to walk.
With kindness I guided them, with the tender cords of human kindness I led them.
But Israel will certainly return to Egypt,
Their enemies will attack Israel’s cities with swords;
My people are determined to turn away from me.
But you people of Israel—dear Israel—I cannot abandon you.
I have decided not to punish you severely.
They will live their lives following my commands.
They will come fluttering into the land
“The people of Israel have continually lied to me.
The people of Israel do only what is useless;
Yahweh is also accusing the people of Judah of breaking his covenant.
When Jacob was in his mother’s womb, he grabbed his brother Esau’s heel because he wanted to take his brother’s place and be the firstborn.
When the angel appeared to him, he struggled with him and won.
This is Yahweh, the God of the angel armies!
Turn to your God!
The merchants are wicked; they use scales that give wrong weights and measures,
The people of Israel boast,
But Yahweh says, “I am Yahweh, whom you should worship;
Many times I spoke to the prophets and gave them messages, for them to give to you;
The prophet says that if it is true that the people in the region of Gilead are wicked,
Jacob fled to the land of Aram;
Yahweh used the prophet Moses to bring Israel out of Egypt,
The people of Israel have caused Yahweh to become very angry;
Yahweh says, “When the leaders of Israel spoke, the people trembled;
Now they sin more and more;
So the people of Israel will disappear
But I am Yahweh, whom you should worship;
I took charge of you in the wilderness,
When I provided food for you,
So I will attack you like a lion;
I will come against you like a female bear when someone steals her cubs,
You people of Israel, I will destroy you.
You no longer have any king
When I gave you a king, I gave him to you because I was angry with you.
I have kept track of all the wicked deeds that you people of Israel have committed; I have recorded all your guilt.
You are like a baby ready to be born,
Will I really keep you from dying?
The prophet Hosea says: “Even though you people of Israel are wealthier than those of Judah,
The people of the city of Samaria are guilty because they have rebelled against God.
Israel, return to Yahweh your God!
So now, return to Yahweh, and think about how you will confess your sins to him.
Assyria cannot save us.
Yahweh says, “I will forgive these people for having stopped honoring me;
I will help the people of Israel as the dew helps the ground.
They will be like trees whose branches spread out.
They will return and live under the protection that Israel has from me;
You people of Israel, I will completely stop you from worshiping idols.
Every wise person will understand the things about which I have written;
